headline: FirstEnergy Receives Industry Awards for Ohio Storm Restoration Effort and Assistance with Hurricanes Helene and Milton
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) received an Emergency Recovery Award from the Edison Electric Institute (EEI) in recognition of its outstanding response in restoring power to hundreds of thousands of customers in northeast Ohio following a historic weather event in August 2024 that brought severe thunderstorms, wind and tornadoes.

headline: FirstEnergy Names Two to Vice President, Finance and Regulatory Roles for West Virginia/Maryland and Ohio
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) today announced it has hired Arsalan Azarsa as Vice President, Finance and Regulatory for West Virginia and Maryland, effective February 10, and Kevin Keller as Vice President, Finance and Regulatory for Ohio, effective February 24.
